alert.note: Alert for Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 05 at 6:47PM CST until March 08 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas...Louisiana... Bayou Dorcheat Near Springhill affecting Webster and Columbia Parishes. For the Bayou Dorcheat...including Springhill, Dixie Inn, Lake Bistineau...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Dorcheat Near Springhill. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Expect minor lowland flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CST Sunday the stage was 11.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:00 PM CST Sunday was 11.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.5 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 1000 AM CST.
